perturbation.original_text: Any controversy between the parties arising under this Agreement and not resolved by the parties shall be determined in accordance with the laws of the State of Michigan.
perturbation.changed_text: Any controversy between the parties arising under this Agreement and not resolved by the parties shall be determined at the sole discretion of the Transporter.
perturbation.explanation: This change removes the application of Michigan state laws in resolving disputes, replacing it with the sole discretion of the Transporter. This could contradict consumer protection laws and regulations that would otherwise apply in Michigan, creating a legal risk for the Shipper, particularly regarding issues like fair pricing, service standards, and liability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Michigan Consumer Protection Act (MCPA) and potentially other relevant Michigan state laws governing contracts and commercial transactions.
